app.name: Anotee
hero.desc_new: A centralized platform for professional review. Frame-accurate edits, version control, and intelligent assistance in one click.
hero.quote: "We are a small team building Anotee. You fund the development, and we gift you the tool forever."
roadmap.title: Choose Your Future
roadmap.subtitle: Transparent pricing model for early adopters.
land.speed.title: Speed that changes the game
land.speed.sub: We measured the turnaround time for typical tasks in Anotee compared to traditional file transfer methods.
land.stat.92.desc: "Reduced advertising spot approval time from 5 days to 4 hours."
land.stat.0.desc: Thanks to the checklist system, not a single client request gets lost in chat history.
land.flow.title: Anotee turns chaotic edits into a structured workflow.
land.flow.sub: Frame accuracy, instant proxies, and AI assistant in one interface.
land.roi.title: Speed that pays off
land.roi.94: Reduction in "feedback call" time. All info is already in the frame.
land.roi.0ms: Latency when scrubbing timeline in browser. Comfort of a cloud editing station.
land.integrations.title: Works with Your Favorite Editor
why.title: Why Anotee?
why.feat1.title: Timecode Edits
why.feat1.desc: Leave comments directly on the video. No more "something is off at second 15". Every pixel and frame under control.
why.feat2.title: Versioning 2.0
why.feat2.desc: Compare v1 and v2 in Side-by-Side mode. Watch the project evolve from draft to final render.
why.feat3.title: Direct Access
why.feat3.desc: Share secure links. The client doesn't need to register — they simply open the link and leave feedback.
dash.no_access: You don't have access to any projects here. Please open the specific link provided to you by the editor.
dash.field.name: Project Name
dash.locked_msg: Cannot share a locked project. Unlock it first.
dash.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.
pv.role.creator: Creator
pv.share.title: Invite to Review
pv.share.desc: Share this link with your client or team. They can access the project instantly.
pv.share.info: Viewers cannot delete files or create new projects.
pv.locked_banner: Project is locked. Editing and sharing are disabled.
pv.remove_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the team?
pv.review_mode_banner: Review Mode: Access limited to specific assets.
player.offline_desc: The source file is no longer accessible. Please re-select it to continue.
player.export.title: Export Markers
upsell.title: Why Upgrade?
upsell.subtitle: Support independent software and unlock professional workflows.
upsell.free.title: Starter / Personal
upsell.founder.title: Founder Club
page.workflow.title: How Anotee Works
page.workflow.step1.desc: Drag & drop video files. We create instant proxies and thumbnails.
page.workflow.step2.desc: Send a link to your client or team. They join instantly via Clerk.
page.workflow.step3.desc: Frame-accurate commenting. Draw on screen (coming soon). Real-time sync.
page.workflow.step4.desc: Download markers as EDL, XML (Resolve), or CSV to fix edits instantly.
page.about.title: About Us
page.about.hero: Built for Flow, Not for Shareholders.
page.about.mission: Anotee is a passion project built by a small team for the filmmaking community. No corporate bloat, just speed.
page.about.story.title: The Journey
page.about.story.text: We started Anotee because we were tired of subscription fatigue and sluggish tools. Our goal is simple: provide a lightweight, professional review tool that respects your time and your wallet.
page.about.feat.fast.title: Video Feedback 10x Faster
page.about.feat.fast.desc: Forget long email chains. Anotee is a professional video collaboration space: precise edits, version control, and instant access.
page.about.feat.instant.title: Instant Playback
page.about.feat.instant.desc: Automatic proxy generation and local file handling allows 4K playback without lag, even offline.
page.pricing.title: Fair Pricing
page.pricing.subtitle: Invest once, use forever during the V1 lifecycle.
page.pricing.why_title: Why we are ending lifetime access soon
page.pricing.why_text: We develop Anotee (cloud sync) as a small team. To cover future server costs, we will have to switch to a subscription model later. But we want to reward those who support us today with a permanent fee exemption.
page.docs.title: Documentation
page.docs.formats: Supported Formats: MP4, MOV, WEBM, MKV.
page.ai.title: Capabilities and Advantages
page.ai.subtitle: Why professional studios switch to Anotee
page.ai.card1.title: Annotations on Canvas
page.ai.card1.desc: Drawing arrows and circles over video footage.
page.ai.card1.benefit: Benefit: Eliminates "broken phone". The editor immediately understands which object in the frame needs fixing.
page.ai.card2.title: Versioning (Stacks)
page.ai.card2.desc: Grouping all iterations (v1, v2, v3) into one slot.
page.ai.card2.benefit: Benefit: The client sees progress and doesn't get lost in dozens of different links on YouTube/Drive.
page.ai.card3.title: AI-Summary
page.ai.card3.desc: Automatic transformation of chat into a task list.
page.ai.card3.benefit: Benefit: Saves 2-3 hours of producer work on every project. Instant brief for editing.
page.ai.card4.title: Speech Search
page.ai.card4.benefit: Benefit: Quick search for the right phrase in an hour-long interview without watching the whole thing.
page.ai.card5.title: Smart Proxy
page.ai.card5.benefit: Benefit: Review 4K material from phone, on the road, without downloading. Decision speed x5.
page.ai.card6.title: NDA Protection
page.ai.card6.desc: Password protection and link expiration dates.
page.ai.card6.benefit: Benefit: IP Safety. You control who views content and when.
page.ai.card11.title: NLE Integration
page.ai.card11.desc: Export comments to DaVinci Resolve (.xml), Premiere Pro (.csv).
page.ai.card11.benefit: Benefit: Instant timeline markers. No manual entry.
page.ai.card12.title: Hybrid Storage
page.ai.card12.desc: We stream directly from your Google Drive. No re-uploading needed.
page.ai.card12.benefit: Benefit: Zero storage costs on platform. You own the files.
page.ai.card13.title: Checklist Mode
page.ai.card13.desc: Mark comments as "Resolved" to track progress.
page.ai.card13.benefit: Benefit: Nothing gets forgotten before render.
page.ai.card14.title: Mobile Review
page.ai.card14.desc: Full functionality on smartphones. Touch gestures supported.
page.ai.card7.title: Anotee Drop (P2P)
page.ai.card7.desc: Direct browser-to-browser transfer for RAW/ProRes without cloud limits.
page.ai.card8.title: NLE Live Link
page.ai.card8.desc: Stream Premiere/Resolve viewport in 4K (<200ms latency) directly to review session.
page.ai.card9.title: Synchronous Review
page.ai.card9.desc: Sync Play/Pause, Live Cursors presence, and Voice Chat for remote teams.
page.ai.card10.title: Remote Production
page.ai.card10.desc: Remote ADR audio recording and secure Tunnel access to local servers.
rm.lifetime_desc: Pay once. Use forever. No subscriptions.
rm.last_chance: Last chance to get software without subscription.
rm.saas_desc: New users pay monthly. Founders pay nothing.
profile.title: User Profile
profile.founder_msg: You are a Founder's Club member. Thank you for supporting Anotee!
profile.migrate_desc: Link your Google account to keep your comments, access rights, and history forever. Don't lose your work when you clear browser data.
